name: Freaky Friday
description:
This is Freaky Friday, you wake up and you are in a strange place with things trying to get at you, survive the day or let Freaky Friday claim you forever!

Controls

  • WASD or Gamepad Stick for movement
  • Space or Gamepad A to Jump
  • Left click or Gamepad X to attack
  • Shift or Gamepad left trigger to run
